description:
Two Iron Chefs from space come down to challenge Keroro to a cooking competition!  If he loses, they get the frogs` secret base.  But how can he possibly hold a candle to their expertise?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Tetsujin Chef no Chousenjou de Arimasu / Tamama Saikyou Senshi no Chousenjou Desuu de Arimasu
ケロロ 鉄人シェフの挑戦状 であります / タママ 最強戦士の挑戦状ですぅ であります
